commit message:
Use DrawerManager.State in ItemsAdapter, reset to AllUnreadFolder on login

Fixes a crash when logging in again when not in AllUnreadFolder
Use bigger TextAppereance for empty list item

Fix loading favicons again

Picasso only keeps a WeakReference to the Target, so tag the Target to the
view using view.setTag(target), so it will live as long as the view is alive

See http://stackoverflow.com/a/26918731
Turn the PaletteBitmapAsyncListener into a field
Let Picasso apply the bitmap to the ImageView
Use dimens from Materialize, center favicon horizontally
Add margin to webview
Add bottom margins to elements on the login activity
Reduce margin for list item and move the favicon to the top again
Don't set favicon twice on ImageViews

Refactor favicon loading

Replace FaviconUtils with a FaviconLoader and a FaviconLoader.Builder
Add debug launcher icon with different color
Using attr as value doesn't work pre lollipop
Padding on list item is the same on all sides, so just use padding

Workaround bug in pre 19 sdk

When setting the background resource on a view, the padding is lost on
sdk < 19
Update gradle plugin to 2.1.2
Only draw progress on the fab for sdk levels >= 21 for now
Fade toolbar colors when swiping articles
Simplify FaviconLoader
Workaround colors not being set immediately when starting ItemPagerActivity
Update to version 0.10 (13)
